m_szDocTitle: Tesla Unofficially Takes the Wraps off of the New Model S | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Unofficially Takes The Wraps Off Of The New Model S April 12th, 2016 by Kyle Field   Image Credit: Redditor alexeiw123 Rumors of a Tesla Model S refresh that would bring the smooth front end of the X to the S have been swirling around for several months now, and it looks like we get our first look at it today. A Redditor posted a picture of a new canvas going up in the Tesla store in Richmond, Australia, that shows the new Model S front end. It’s essentially just the Model X front end … pasted onto the S.
